name: The Only Outlaw
description:
Try to find the hidden outlaw in The Only Outlaw, a game made in 48 hours for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam!

How to play:

In The Only Outlaw, you have to find a criminal hiding amongst a crowd of people and use your mouse to shoot him.

You start with 5 seconds on the first round, but gain 5 additional seconds for each criminal you kill. If you miss or shoot the wrong person, however, you lose 5 seconds! The game ends when the timer runs out.

As you advance, the difficulty increases. Crowds become larger, people start running around, and the lights even go out. Try to beat your high score!

Credits:

Music: www.bensound.com
